title: River Valley-Galion football preview
text:
River Valley Vikings vs. Galion Tigers 
Where: Heise Park, Galion 
Records: River Valley 5-1 overall, 3-0 Mid Ohio Athletic Conference; Galion 4-2 overall, 1-2 MOAC 
Last year: River Valley won 21-17 
Last week: River Valley defeated Fairbanks 46-8; Galion defeated Marion Harding 24-21 
Keys for Galion 
Win in this game would keep Galionâ€™s playoff hopes alive. 
Keep its offense once again keyed around the running of RB Drake Barnett. 
Keep penalties to a minimum, something the Tigers have done fairly well this season. 
Keys for River Valley 
Vikings must find a way to slow Barnett, the leading rusher in the MOAC with 1,032 yards. 
Sustain offensive production the Vikings have shown in their last two games. 
Another key game in drive for MOAC title and playoff berth. 
Stat of the week
